assessments.status_rationale: Reported Dec 2025 payroll gain was about +50,000 and the unemployment rate was about 4.4% (CNBC, NYT coverage), which falls outside the forecast ranges (+100k to +225k; 3.7% to 4.0%).
No bullet indicates a PBoC reserve-requirement ratio (RRR) cut; the deadline is 2026-06-30.
No bullet references the FY2027 U.S. national defense budget request level; the deadline is 2026-05-31.

Multiple bullets claim the administration is starting/ordering purchases of ~$200B in “mortgage bonds,” including a CNBC headline stating Trump ordered buying $200B. This appears directionally consistent with endorsing $100B+ of mortgage-backed purchases to lower rates, but the prediction specifically requires "agency MBS"; the provided bullets don’t explicitly confirm the assets are agency MBS rather than a broader set of mortgage bonds.
No bullet reports GM changing 2026 capex guidance; the deadline is 2026-07-31.

Iran is reported to be experiencing nationwide protests, but there is no cited NetBlocks/Cloudflare Radar evidence of an Iran-wide 50%+ connectivity disruption lasting 12+ hours; deadline is 2026-03-31.
No bullet indicates NABU or SAPO has confirmed opening a formal proceeding tied to the referenced lithium project award; deadline is 2026-06-30.
News mentions Greenland geopolitics but not any U.S. government financing/insurance/grant support for Greenland-based critical minerals/rare earths at the $100M+ level; deadline is 2026-09-30.
No bullet references NSF/NOAA/DOE funding announcements for ocean alkalinity enhancement totaling $20M+; deadline is 2026-12-31.
No bullet indicates NASA’s ASAP has published minutes/transcripts explicitly referencing an expedited Crew-11 return due to a medical issue; deadline is 2026-03-31.
